Certainly! There are many yoga and meditation retreats and ashrams in Rishikesh that offer courses and workshops on various yoga styles, meditation techniques, and Ayurvedic treatments. Some of the popular ones are:

1. Parmarth Niketan: It is one of the largest ashrams in Rishikesh, offering a range of yoga and meditation retreats, workshops, and courses throughout the year.

2. Ananda in the Himalayas: It is a luxurious wellness retreat set amidst the serene surroundings of Rishikesh. The retreat offers programs including yoga, meditation, Ayurvedic therapies, and more.

3. Sivananda Ashram: Founded by Swami Sivananda in 1936, this ashram offers traditional yoga and meditation practices along with various courses on spirituality and holistic living.

4. Phool Chatti Ashram: Situated on the banks of the Ganges, Phool Chatti is an ideal retreat for those seeking to immerse themselves in a peaceful and natural environment. The ashram offers yoga and meditation retreats and courses, as well as Ayurvedic treatments.

5. Osho Ganga Dham Ashram: This ashram offers a unique approach to meditation and yoga, inspired by the teachings of the Indian philosopher Osho. The ashram offers multi-day meditation retreats and workshops.

If you are interested, it is recommended to read reviews and do some research to find a retreat or ashram that suits your personal preferences and goals.
